children.description: Content rendered inside the banner. (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the banner.

color.description: Color options for the banner, will be overwritten by any applied using the status prop.

isSticky.description: If set to true, the banner sticks to the top of its container

screenReaderText.description:
Text announced by screen readers to indicate the type of banner. This prop should only
be passed in when the banner conveys status/severity.

status.description: Status style options for the banner, will overwrite any color applied using the color prop.
